column5: Never really did much trout/salmon fishing this time of year but it looks like a great way to start the season so I'm heading out of Jordon on monday AM.  Looking for a 2nd.  I dont have downriggers but I do have planers/dipsys etc.which should get the job done. ' Would like someone to join me that has some knowledge of this type of fishing please and thanks.  PM if interested.  Cheers!
Damn wish I didn't have to work.   I'm itching to get out.
Damn wish I didn't have to work. I'm itching to get out. I suggested to him the he get in touch with you.  You know how to get to those Lake O fish!
How did you guys do today?
How did you guys do today? Yeah, how did it go is why I cam back to this thread.
I'm itching to try out my new Church boards!  The action should be heating up down there with this weather.
